alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 24 at 2:58AM MDT until March 25 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 18 to 24 inches in the Tetons, 8 to 20 inches in the Salt River and Wyoming Ranges, and 6 to 12 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 11 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Teton Pass and Salt Pass will be impacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
